block.p: Wendy Cunningham Benson, a daughter of Gigi and Harry Benson of New York, was married yesterday to Michael Christopher Landes, a son of Patricia and Bernard Landes of Laguna Niguel, Calif. Canon Harry E. Krauss performed the ceremony at St. Thomas Episcopal Church in New York. The Rev. Paul Tabor, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the service.

The couple, both 28, are actors in Los Angeles. The bride recently completed filming ''James Dean: An Invented Life,'' which is expected to appear on the TNT cable network early next year. The bridegroom is now shooting a new series for the UPN network called ''Special Unit''; it is expected to be broadcast this fall. They met in Boston last summer while shooting an independent film, ''The Gentleman From Boston.''

Wendy Cunningham Benson, a daughter of Gigi and Harry Benson of New York, was married yesterday to Michael Christopher Landes, a son of Patricia and Bernard Landes of Laguna Niguel, Calif. Canon Harry E. Krauss performed the ceremony at St. Thomas Episcopal Church in New York. The Rev. Paul Tabor, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the service.

The couple, both 28, are actors in Los Angeles. The bride recently completed filming ''James Dean: An Invented Life,'' which is expected to appear on the TNT cable network early next year. The bridegroom is now shooting a new series for the UPN network called ''Special Unit''; it is expected to be broadcast this fall. They met in Boston last summer while shooting an independent film, ''The Gentleman From Boston.''

The bride trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art in London and the National Theater Institute at the Eugene O'Neill Center in Waterford, Conn. Her father is a photojournalist whose work appears in Vanity Fair and The New Yorker; he is also the author of photography books that are edited by the bride's mother. Those works include ''The Beatles: Now and Then'' (Universe, 1998) and ''First Families: An Intimate Portrait From the Kennedys to the Clintons'' (Bullfinch Press, 1997).

The bridegroom trained at the Stella Adler Academy of Acting in Los Angeles. His mother is an interior decorator and his father is a marketing consultant to the pharmaceuticals industry, both in Laguna Niguel.
